name: Chicken 65
description: Boneless chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then deep-fried for a spicy, crispy finish with a hint of curry leaves.

name: Chicken Wings
description: Juicy chicken wings coated in spices, fried to a crispy texture, and tossed in a tangy, mildly spicy sauce.

name: Chicken Lollipop
description: Drumstick chicken coated in a spiced batter and deep-fried, served with a zesty dipping sauce.

name: Chilli Chicken
description: Boneless chicken cubes tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce with peppers and onions, an Indo-Chinese favorite.

name: Chicken Fry Boneless
description: Boneless chicken pieces marinated in spices and fried to a golden crisp with a tender inside.

name: Chicken 555
description: A special chicken dish with a crispy coating, tossed in a unique blend of spices for a spicy kick.

name: Chicken Manchurian
description: Crispy fried chicken pieces in a savory Manchurian sauce with bell peppers and onions.

name: Dragon Chicken
description: Spicy chicken strips stir-fried with bell peppers, cashews, and a hint of sweetness.

name: Garlic Chicken
description: Succulent chicken cooked with garlic, soy sauce, and spices for a rich, savory taste.

name: Crispy Chicken
description: Thin chicken strips breaded and fried to a crispy, golden perfection with a soft inside.

name: Prawn Fry
description: Fresh prawns marinated in spices and fried until golden, with a crispy coating.

name: Chilly Prawns
description: Prawns tossed in a spicy chili sauce with peppers, offering a blend of heat and flavor.

name: Prawn 65
description: Prawns marinated in a spiced yogurt mix and fried for a crispy, flavorful starter.

name: Prawn Manchurian
description: Crispy prawns coated in a tangy Manchurian sauce with garlic and green onions.

name: Apollo Fish
description: Boneless fish marinated in a spicy mix and stir-fried with curry leaves for a signature flavor.

name: Fish Fry
description: Fish fillets marinated in spices and fried until crispy, served with lemon and onions.

name: Fish 65
description: Spicy fried fish in South Indian style, with a crispy coating and a tender inside.

name: Chilli Egg
description: Boiled egg pieces stir-fried in a spicy chili sauce with bell peppers and onions.
